description: The initiative, led by the Asociación Nacional de las Cadenas Productivas del Penco y la Cabulla (ANAGABEV), focuses on promoting the agave value chain in Ecuador. It aims to preserve ancestral agricultural practices while integrating modern technologies to enhance food security and community identity. By collaborating with academia and local producers, ANAGABEV seeks to revitalize the agave plant's diverse uses, ensuring its sustainability for future generations and fostering social, academic, and environmental development.
name: Asociación ANAGABEV
